summary: REQ-12/13/14 are largely implemented via a new restricted-source detection utility, early fail-fast behavior in the link conversion flow, inline URL warnings in the input UI, and tailored error messaging for YouTube/TikTok. The diff also includes several unrelated UI/theme/encoding/library changes that were not requested in this BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed chat UI behavior and layout features (auto-scroll management, dedicated scrollable thread container, and a "Scroll to latest" button).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-12/13/14, which are specifically about restricted-source detection/warnings/error classification for YouTube/TikTok links.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/styling changes (warm amber/orange color system, viewport-height CSS variable behavior, body scroll confinement) and Tailwind theme extensions.
MP3 encoding pipeline hardening and addition of a bundled lamejs vendor library and type declarations.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-12/13/14 (these requirements concern link handling for YouTube/TikTok).
